ISSUE.TITLE: `CustomerSearchModel.AvatarEnabled` has internal property access
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/blob/676ab6372cf9aa4d0e834091c326742d213dc726/src/Presentation/Nop.Web/Areas/Admin/Models/Customers/CustomerSearchModel.cs#L91 `AvatarEnabled` is the only property in that model that has internal access for some reason.
